description:
Enjoy a warm shower at your home away from home. Packing down small when you're on the go, the flexible design fits in a hatch or backpack before unrolling to accommodate 20L of water. An integrated thermometer indicates if the water is luke warm or steamy, and the top handle and lash straps provide attachment options for when it's shower time.

  • Flexible PVC bag absorbs heat from the sun
  • Protective fabric cover with a large mesh storage pocket for toiletries
  • Flow-control shower head allows you to control water pressure
  • Integrated thermometer indicates water temperature in celcius and fahrenheit
  • Hanging handle and lash straps provide attachment options
name: Survive Outdoors Longer Solar Shower 20L
